original_text: But as for you, continue in what you have learned and have firmly believed, knowing from whom you learned it
korean_text: 그러나 너는 배우고 확신한 일에 거하라 너는 네가 누구에게서 배운 것을 알며

sentences.original_text: continue in what you have learned
and what you have firmly believed,
knowing from whom you learned it
